creator: pier@betaversion.org
text:
Attached to this bug there is my little proposal for a "Slide Lite" version.

Slide Lite is a DAV Level-1 only minimal implementation supporting only
java.io.File backend stores, without PROPPATCH support, but that can be used in
situations where the size of Slide (full) is an issue, and lack of functionality
is not.

creator: pier@betaversion.org
text:
Created attachment 14352
Initial implementation Slide Lite

This is my code. I hope noone is going to get upset by the fact I used the
"Slide Lite" name, and "org.apache.slide.lite" package.

creator: pier@betaversion.org
